subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: For 12 years as the Padres’ manager, Bruce Bochy had a pretty cushy gig. Now with the Giants, he will deal with topics that include steroids, contract disputes and a home run record.
snippet: For 12 years as the Padres’ manager, Bruce Bochy had a pretty cushy gig. Now with the Giants, he will deal with topics that include steroids, contract disputes and a home run record.
